about_the_game:
Kubberz is an Action RPG where you can take part on epic battles against your friends and other players around the world, as well as collect and train more then 100 different species of Kubberz.

EXPLORE
Don't miss out! A new world full of memorable experiences and unforgettable challenges awaits. Are you ready?

CAPTURE
Use the Z DEVICE to capture as many kubberz as you can and learn more about their personalities.

EVOLVE
Defeat other kubberz, gain experience to level up and see your team evolve.

FIGHT
Fight against wild kubberz or challenge friends and players around the world.

SUCCEED
Don’t waste any more time! Give this new experience a chance and start your journey towards victory.

GATHER KOINS
Trade your koins for items and be prepared for what lies ahead! The more Koins you get, the more itens you can buy!

CUSTOMIZE YOUR CHARACTER
You can customize your character as you wish. Change your face, body, hair and clothing. Collect Koins and go to our shop to buy skins, backpacks, masks and much more. Change your looks and stand out from the crowd. Win your battles in style!

BATTLES
Make sure your kubberz are always ready for battle! Your team composition can make all the diference!

EXP
The higher the level of your team, the greater the chances you will be victorious in battles. To level up your teammates will need experience. They gain XP every time they defeat other kubberz.

Official Website |
Twitter |
Facebook |

name: Kubberz

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bits
  • Processor: Intel I5 3470
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 750 TI, AMD Radeon R7 265 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Join the incredible open world of Kubberz, where you can find extraordinary creatures with powers that go beyond human comprehension. Train and get as many kubberz as you can, develop your own strategies and make your team victorious! Challenge your friends or join them during this amazing jorney.
supported_languages:
English*, Portuguese - Brazil*
*languages with full audio support
